review: Did some research on other IT sites as well as Amazon to determine which TV streaming tech I wanted. Disclosure; I am a Prime member for a few years now. Still wanted the best streamer to transition from my Blu-ray player which is getting old and of course lots slower when streaming off the internet. And no updates seemed to be coming from the maker for my model :( Also I have an older model 40"Sony TV but open HDMI slots. Looking at the price for all the smart TV's out there and was dissuaded from buying a TV. Thus to the Fire TV Stick very good option for my needs. Downside 1. pricey 2. doesn't mirror with my Kindle Fire HD 8.9 tablet (still can use HDMI to tablet cable to connect to TV). Jury is still out while getting to know the TV Stick but so far things do happen faster and it has only shut down once (some nonsense about my internet connection while all my other devices had no such problem). All in all got Prime this is a good add on device.
